text: Momase Region is one of four regions of Papua New Guinea. Its largest city is Lae, the second city of the nation. The name Momase is a portmanteau of the constituent provinces, Morobe, Madang and Sepik (East and West). Momase is by far the most linguistically diverse region of Papua New Guinea. ==Subdivision== The Region is administratively divided into four provinces: *East Sepik *Madang *Morobe *Sandaun (West Sepik) ==See also== * Provinces of Papua New Guinea ==References== Category:Regions of Papua New Guinea
title: Momase Region
